channel.title: TopList Suggestion
channel.description:
I think server listing priority should go to voting instead of uptime...
People tend to forward visitors into the site by voting, which increases moparscape traffic and also gives priority to true servers which people like to stand out...

item.title: TopList Suggestion
item.dc:creator: @Togasa Togasa
item.description:
@Togasa wrote:

BenMoss:

Refresh all votes and then watch them making sure people don’t get over 1,000 a day (that would be using a vote bot / proxy) because the people with 40000 votes are from like 2010…

This isn’t fool proof… either and just an assumption and can potentially limit a truly amazing server(s).

Read full topic

item.title: TopList Suggestion
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

There is a dedicated ‘Most Popular’ button to sort by votes, the way you are asking. I’ve been considering making this the default, but it can be cheated too, probably easier than uptime. If you have any ideas I’m always open to them.

Read full topic

it’s a status list not a top list
